help-file.title: BRIGAND
help-file.content:
The Brigand takes advantage of holes in the defense of the enemy, which can occur casting or clambering to their feet. He use these moments to deal crippling attacks to different parts of the body. And, with some luck, he may hit the victim's larynx, causing spell casters to abort. Or, stomp the victim's knees so that they have trouble running away.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Ambush 46th level: Crippling Strike 51st level: Disruptive Blow
